Class Debug

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ntechniks.nstudios.androidutils.Debug

  • public class Debug
extends java.lang.Object
    Official Git repository at https://github.com/marulka/android-utils
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.06
    Author:
    Nikola Georgiev

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEBUG_MODE_ALL_OFF
      No log messages will be shown.
      static int DEBUG_MODE_ALL_ON
      Show all log messages (the default).
      static int DEBUG_MODE_AT_LEAST_DEBUGINFO
      Show debug log messages that are useful during development only, as well as the message levels Info, Warning, and Error.
      static int DEBUG_MODE_AT_LEAST_INFORMATIONAL
      Show expected log messages for regular usage, as well as the message levels Warning, and Error.
      static int DEBUG_MODE_AT_LEAST_WARNINGS
      Show possible issues that are not yet errors, as well as the message level Error.
      static int DEBUG_MODE_ONLY_ERRORS
      Show issues that have caused errors.

    • Method Detail

      • wNull

        public static void wNull(@NonNull
                         java.lang.String tag,
                         @NonNull
                         java.lang.String variableName,
                         @NonNull
                         java.lang.String methodName)
        Shows Log message for Null Pointer as a warning. Also, there will be printed information about the class name and the method, in which the event occurred.

        Output Example: "The variable Object is null. The method() won't proceed forward."

        Parameters:
        tag - String - The name of the caller Class.
        variableName - String - The name of the variable and/or object type.
        methodName - String - The name of the method in which his event occurred.
        Since:
        1.0

      • wSize

        public static void wSize(@NonNull
                         java.lang.String tag,
                         @NonNull
                         java.lang.String variableName,
                         @NonNull
                         java.lang.String methodName)
        Shows Log message for a Zero size as a warning. Also, there will be printed information about the class name and the method, in which the event occurred.

        Output Example: "The variable Object has ZERO size. The method() won't proceed forward."

        Parameters:
        tag - String - The name of the caller Class.
        variableName - String - The name of the variable and/or object type.
        methodName - String - The name of the method in which his event occurred.
        Since:
        1.0

      • wLength

        public static void wLength(@NonNull
                           java.lang.String tag,
                           @NonNull
                           java.lang.String variableName,
                           @NonNull
                           java.lang.String methodName)
        Shows Log message for Zero length as a warning. Also, there will be printed information about the class name and the method, in which the event occurred.

        Output Example: "The variable Object has ZERO length. The method() won't proceed forward."

        Parameters:
        tag - String - The name of the caller Class.
        variableName - String - The name of the variable and/or object type.
        methodName - String - The name of the method in which his event occurred.
        Since:
        1.0

      • error

        public static void error(@NonNull
                         java.lang.String tag,
                         @NonNull
                         java.lang.String whileDo,
                         @NonNull
                         java.lang.String methodName,
                         java.lang.Throwable e)
        Shows a custom Log message as an error. Also, there will be printed information about the class name and the method, in which the event occurred.

        Output Example: "An error occurred while trying to close stream. Occurred in the myFunction() method."

        Parameters:
        tag - String - The name of the caller Class.
        whileDo - String - Description of the action that may cause this error.
        methodName - String - The name of the method in which his event occurred.
        e - Throwable - The detailed Exception that has been thrown.
        Since:
        1.0

      • wIns

        public static void wIns(@NonNull
                        java.lang.String tag,
                        @NonNull
                        java.lang.String variable,
                        @NonNull
                        java.lang.String comparator,
                        @NonNull
                        java.lang.String methodName)
        Shows Log message for Not Instance Of Object as a warning. Also, there will be printed information about the class name and the method, in which the event occurred.

        Output Example: "The variable String is NOT instance of the Collection. The myFunction() method won't proceed forward."

        Parameters:
        tag - String - The name of the caller Class.
        variable - String - The name of the variable and/or object type.
        comparator - String - The object type that this variable was compared to.
        methodName - String - The name of the method in which his event occurred.
        Since:
        1.01

      • warn

        public static void warn(@NonNull
                        java.lang.String tag,
                        @NonNull
                        java.lang.String warning,
                        @NonNull
                        java.lang.String methodName)
        Shows a custom Log message as a warning. Also, there will be printed information about the class name and the method, in which the event occurred.

        Output Example: "Your warning message here. The myFunction() won't proceed forward."

        Parameters:
        tag - String - The name of the caller Class.
        warning - String - A custom warning message which will be shown.
        methodName - String - The name of the method in which his event occurred.
        Since:
        1.02

      • dMsg

        public static void dMsg(@NonNull
                        java.lang.String tag,
                        @NonNull
                        java.lang.String debugMsg,
                        @NonNull
                        java.lang.String methodName)
        Shows a custom Log message as a debug info. Also, there will be printed information about the class name and the method, in which the event occurred.

        Output Example: "Your debug info message here. Occurred in the myFunction() method."

        Parameters:
        tag - String - The name of the caller Class.
        debugMsg - String - A custom debug info message will be shown.
        methodName - String - The name of the method in which his event occurred.
        Since:
        1.04

      • info

        public static void info(@NonNull
                        java.lang.String tag,
                        @NonNull
                        java.lang.String info)
        Shows a custom Log message as an information. No additional information will be shown, just the emitter class name and your message.

        Output Example: "Your warning message here."

        Parameters:
        tag - String - The name of the caller Class.
        info - String - A custom informational message which will be shown.
        Since:
        1.06
